org.gradoop.temporal.model.impl.operators.matching.common.query

Class TemporalQueryHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.matching.common.query.QueryHandler
      • org.gradoop.temporal.model.impl.operators.matching.common.query.TemporalQueryHandler

  • public class TemporalQueryHandler
extends QueryHandler
    Wraps a GDLHandler and adds functionality needed for query processing during graph pattern matching. Extension of the flink QueryHandler for temporal queries

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TemporalQueryHandler(String gdlString)
      Creates a new query handler that postprocesses the CNF with a default CNFPostProcessing
      TemporalQueryHandler(String gdlString, CNFPostProcessing postProcessing)
      Creates a new query handler.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getEdgeCount()
      Returns the number of edges in the query graph.
      org.gradoop.gdl.model.comparables.time.TimeLiteral getNow()
      Returns the TimeLiteral representing the systime at the start of query processing
      CNF getPredicates()
      Returns all available predicates in Conjunctive Normal Form CNF.
      int getVertexCount()
      Returns the number of vertices in the query graph.
      boolean isSingleVertexGraph()
      Checks if the graph returns a single vertex and no edges (no loops).

        Parameters:
        gdlString - GDL query string
        postProcessing - transformations to apply to the CNF

    • Method Detail

      • getPredicates

        public CNF getPredicates()
        Returns all available predicates in Conjunctive Normal Form CNF. If there are no predicates defined in the query, a CNF containing zero predicates is returned.
        Overrides:
        getPredicates in class QueryHandler
        Returns:
        predicates

        public boolean isSingleVertexGraph()
        Checks if the graph returns a single vertex and no edges (no loops).
        Overrides:
